test-set.name: xp-striding-grounded-motionlessB
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Grounded, RS: Motionless Step expressions child, namespace, attribute and descendant on a childless node kind selects nothing, is always grounded

test-case.name: xp-striding-grounded-motionlessB001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: grounded, RS: motionless Base expression: self::attribute() Separators: / With axes: child, namespace, attribute, descendant With node types: any Invariant: none
